cz.tzima.partialsshot.publishing

Class TestingPublisher

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.tzima.partialsshot.publishing.local.LocalContentPublisher
      • cz.tzima.partialsshot.publishing.dropbox.DropboxContentPublisher
        • cz.tzima.partialsshot.publishing.TestingPublisher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentPublisher

    public class TestingPublisher
extends DropboxContentPublisher
    This ContentPublisher is used for testing purposes only. It is same as the DropboxContentPublisher, but it contains a delay.
    Author:
    Tomas Zima
